attributes.action: Lower the voting age to the age of full criminal responsibility.
attributes.background: Lowering the voting age to the age of criminal responsibility so young people can have a say.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "age of full criminal responsibility". The current age of criminal responsibility is 10 but children can't be tried in an adult court until 18 except in very rare circumstances.

https://www.gov.uk/age-of-criminal-responsibility

You could start a new petition calling for the voting age to be  lowered to 10 if that is something you want to see happen.
